user_instruction: 'Compose an email to the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee with the latest updates. You can check out my Alumni Tracker on Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Latest Alumni Updates

Hi Jane,

I hope you’re doing well! We’re putting together the next email for the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee and want to ensure we include the most up-to-date information on our classmates.

When you have a moment, could you please review the Alumni Tracker on Notion and share any recent updates (new contact details, RSVP changes, milestones, or classmates we’re still trying to locate)? If there’s anything else that should be highlighted, please let us know.

Having this information by [insert preferred date/time] would be a huge help so we can finalize the committee email on schedule.

Thank you very much for your support!

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
On behalf of the Oakwood Alumni Reunion Committee

final_output:
